title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, a user-friendly and educational electronic learning tool designed for ages 8 and up. With this kit, you can embark on 25 guided experiments that explore the fascinating world of motors, generators, and magnetic fields.

The kit includes a 48-page color student guide, making it easy for elderly folks to follow along and understand the concepts. It is suitable for grades 3 to 6, ensuring that learners of all ages can benefit from this STEM-focused educational experience.

This award-winning science kit, which has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, comes with a comprehensive full-color manual from 2012, featuring 60 pages of detailed instructions and explanations. It covers a wide range of topics, including the functions of electric motors and generators, and the study of magnetic fields and electric current.

The kit features an electric motor with transparent plastic casing, allowing users to observe its inner workings. It can be operated with batteries for convenience, or reconfigured to function as a hand-crank electric generator. By experimenting with magnetic fields and electric currents, learners will gain a deeper understanding of these fundamental concepts.

With dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this compact and lightweight kit weighs just 1.3 pounds, making it easily portable and manageable for elderly individuals.

Don't miss out on this exceptional learning opportunity! The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is the perfect tool to explore the wonders of electricity and magnetism in a fun and accessible way. Order yours today and unlock the secrets of motors, generators, and more!

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, the perfect educational tool for kids aged 8 and up! This award-winning science kit is designed to make learning about motors, generators, and magnetic fields fun and exciting. 

With 25 guided experiments, your child will have hands-on experience with the principles of electricity and magnetism. The kit includes a 48-page color student guide, making it easy for anyone to follow along and understand the concepts. 

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is specifically designed for grades 3 to 6, ensuring that it aligns with the curriculum and learning objectives of your child's school. It has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, a testament to its educational value and quality.

The kit features an electric motor made of transparent plastic, allowing your child to see the inner workings and understand how it converts electricity into motion. It also includes a battery-powered motor that can be reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, providing a comprehensive understanding of energy conversion.

Your child will have the opportunity to explore magnetic fields and electric currents, gaining a deeper understanding of these fundamental concepts. The kit also includes experiments on magnetism, building simple circuits, and learning about gears and drive-trains.

The dimensions of the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit are 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth. It weighs only 1.3 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to handle.

Don't miss out on this wonderful STEM learning tool! Give your child the gift of knowledge and discovery with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit.
